attributes.action: Publish Actual Costs of Psychiatry -  Hidden costs are estimated at £billions PA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In these days of NHS insolvency, it is irresponsible of any government to fund an institute such as psychiatry that is not fully monitored for how much it costs the public.
Let's get the true costs of psychiatry out into the open... 

Also, allegedly, deaths occur that are not publicised - the public has a right to know how many people die as a result of receiving psychiatric attention.

The government are requested to publish these details annually:

- Full Cost of funding psychiatry and psychiatric care

- Number of deaths while in psychiatric care

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
